data.title: Reaction error
data.htmlBody:
There has been an error in a Reaction in Fluro.

Reaction:

<%= get('input.item.title') %>

Error:

<%= get('input.message') %>

<%= get('input.data.error.errorMessage') %>

Input:

<%= JSON.stringify(get('input'),null,2) %>

roles.title: Full Access
roles.firstLine: Grants access to Create, Edit, View and Delete almost every type of content in the system
